_comment: INVALID test file for API error validation
_purpose: This file intentionally contains incorrect data to test the error-handling behavior of the breast cancer prediction API. It is used to verify that the API correctly validates the input and returns appropriate error messages.

_specific_error.description: The 'features' array contains only 29 values instead of the required 30

_expected_response.message: Error related to incorrect feature array dimensions

_comparison_with_valid.difference: One feature is missing at position 23

_model_impact: The scikit-learn model expects exactly 30 features. When receiving only 29, model.predict() will fail because the input dimensions do not match those used during training.
_technical_note: This file demonstrates the importance of input validation in Machine Learning APIs. Without proper validation, errors like this could cause unhandled exceptions on the server.

_related_test_cases.test_2: Features provided as a string instead of a list
_related_test_cases.test_4: This file - incorrect number of features
